content.query:
SELECT payment_type, payment_type_desc
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_green_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b'
    ) 
    WITH (
        JSONDoc VARCHAR(MAX)
        )AS payment_type
    CROSS Apply OPENJSON(JSONDoc)
    WITH(
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc VARCHAR(20)

    );
